name: Running On Seconds
description:
Running On Seconds!

Running On Seconds is a game in which the player infiltrates a complex facility and attempts to uncover the hidden location of the bomb planted by enemy agents.

The player must navigate around the facility, killing enemies in order to unlock new areas and gain power-ups. But beware! Killing agents with your pistol will send you back to the beginning of the level. Use tactics like shooting lights and pushing agents into lava to evade this setback. So run, jump, and climb as fast as you can before all six sticks of dynamite do their thing!

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look around

Space to jump

Left Mouse Button to shoot

E to diffuse bomb

Tab to pause

Tips:

  1. No need to kill every enemy, just those you think are going to help you get to the bomb
  2. If you can't make a jump because of distance, try it a couple of times and if it still fails, try to get more movement speed from an enemy
  3. Push enemies into lava to get rewards without respawning
  4. Press and hold W while jumping/falling to vault onto a platform
  5. Don't be afraid to restart the level and use knowledge gained from previous attempts
